description.zh-cn: 前中国女篮队员，姚明之妻。
description.en: Former player of the China women's national basketball team, wife of Yao Ming.

description.zh-cn: 姚明与叶莉之女。
description.en: Daughter of Yao Ming and Ye Li.

description.zh-cn: 美国德克萨斯州城市。
description.en: A city in the U.S. state of Texas.

description.zh-cn: 前职业篮球运动员，姚明之父。
description.en: Former professional basketball player, father of Yao Ming.

description.zh-cn: 前职业篮球运动员，姚明之母。
description.en: Former professional basketball player, mother of Yao Ming.

description.en: Former commissioner of the National Basketball Association (NBA).

zh-cn: 全国政协委员会常务委员

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的组成人员。
description.en: Members of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 姚明出生于上海市徐汇区。
description.en: Yao Ming was born in Xuhui District, Shanghai.

description.zh-cn: 姚明与叶莉于2007年8月6日举办婚礼。
description.en: Yao Ming and Ye Li held their wedding on August 6, 2007.

description.zh-cn: 姚沁蕾于2010年5月22日在美国休斯敦出生。
description.en: Yao Qinlei was born on May 22, 2010, in Houston, USA.

description.zh-cn: 姚明于2018年7月9日从上海交通大学毕业。
description.en: Yao Ming graduated from Shanghai Jiao Tong University on July 9, 2018.

relationships.target: 上海大鲨鱼篮球俱乐部

description.zh-cn: 姚明于1997-2002年作为球员效力于上海大鲨鱼队，并于2009年收购该俱乐部成为老板。
description.en: Yao Ming played for the Shanghai Sharks from 1997-2002 and acquired the club to become its owner in 2009.

relationships.target: 奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂

description.zh-cn: 姚明于2016年4月4日入选奈史密斯篮球名人纪念堂。
description.en: Yao Ming was inducted into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame on April 4, 2016.

description.zh-cn: 姚明于2013年当选为第十二届全国政协委员。
description.en: Yao Ming was elected as a member of the 12th National Committee of the CPPCC in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 姚明在2002年NBA选秀中被休斯敦火箭队以第一顺位选中，开启其NBA生涯。
description.en: Yao Ming was selected by the Houston Rockets with the first overall pick in the 2002 NBA draft, starting his NBA career.

description.zh-cn: 评论员查尔斯·巴克利公开质疑姚明的能力，打赌说如果姚明在新秀赛季中单场得分超过19分，他就“亲吻肯尼·史密斯的臀部”。
description.en: Commentator Charles Barkley publicly doubted Yao Ming's ability, betting he would "kiss Kenny Smith's ass" if Yao scored more than 19 points in a single game during his rookie season.

description.zh-cn: 姚明与沙奎尔·奥尼尔在NBA赛场上是备受关注的竞争对手，他们的对决被称为“姚鲨对决”。
description.en: Yao Ming and Shaquille O'Neal were high-profile rivals on the NBA court, with their matchups dubbed the "Yao-Shaq showdown".

description.zh-cn: 特雷西·麦克格雷迪于2004年加入火箭队，与姚明组成“姚麦组合”，是球队核心搭档。
description.en: Tracy McGrady joined the Rockets in 2004, forming the "Yao-Mac combo" with Yao Ming as the team's core duo.

description.zh-cn: 姚明表示弗兰西斯在他前两个赛季对他帮助很大。
description.en: Yao Ming stated that Francis helped him a lot in his first two seasons.

description.zh-cn: 作为火箭队主教练，杰夫·范甘迪注重培养姚明的进攻能力。
description.en: As the head coach of the Rockets, Jeff Van Gundy focused on developing Yao Ming's offensive skills.

description.zh-cn: 在姚明宣布退役时，时任NBA总裁大卫·斯特恩发表声明，称赞姚明为中美两国的球迷架起了一座非凡的桥梁。
description.en: When Yao Ming announced his retirement, then-NBA Commissioner David Stern issued a statement praising Yao for building an extraordinary bridge between fans in China and the United States.
